title: The Angry Video Game Nerd
fullTitle: The Angry Video Game Nerd (TV Series 2004â€“ )

episodes.title: Chronologically Confused about Kingdom Hearts
episodes.plot: The Nerd attempts to sort out the immense chronology of the Kingdom Hearts game series.

episodes.title: Video Game Magazines
episodes.plot: Before the days of the internet, gamers had magazines to tell them about upcoming games, cheats, insights, etc. There was more variety than just Nintendo Power, which the Nerd already covered in 2007, so watch as he tears through a whole library of unique gamer magazines and sees whether or not they're excellent reading material, or just glossy toilet paper.

episodes.title: Aladdin Deck Enhancer
episodes.plot: The Nerd reviews a Nintendo accessory thought to be long-forgotten in the 'anals' of history: a shameful marketing ploy that lied about enhancing NES games.

episodes.title: Pepsiman (PS1)
episodes.plot: The Nerd prepares to play some video games based off corporate mascots, until Pepsiman suddenly appears in his room and forces him to play Pepsiman on PlayStation.

episodes.title: Superman 64 Returns
episodes.plot: After 11 years, Superman 64 returns and the Nerd can explore further into the game. After all, you have to be able to do more than just go through rings and pick up cars - right?

episodes.title: Life of Black Tiger with Gilbert Gottfried (PS4)
episodes.plot: A horrendous game for the PS4 poises Nerd to confront infamous game developer Fred Fuchs in the heart of the jungle.

episodes.title: Chex Quest
episodes.plot: The Nerd is eating his cereal when he finds a game inside of it. He decides to play it and the game turns out being pretty good.

episodes.title: Jurassic Park: Trespasser (PC)
episodes.plot: While stranded on a remote tropical island inhabited by strange creatures and a working Windows 98 PC, the Nerd looks at Trespasser, a forgotten, glitched Jurassic Park first-person game.

episodes.title: The Immortal (NES)
episodes.plot: From his creepy dungeon beneath his game room, the Nerd reviews the flawed, unfair and super hard Nintendo game simply known as The Immortal.

episodes.title: Spawn Games
episodes.plot: The Nerd goes to Hell and faces an eternity in the worst game of all time - unless he can beat all five Spawn video games. So, with the crazy Clown hounding him at every turn, the Nerd sets about his demonic task.

episodes.title: The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask (N64)
episodes.plot: With the world on the verge of ending on New Years Day 2020, the Nerd spends his last week on earth reviewing a beloved game in the Zelda franchise: Majora's Mask. He plans to take off that mask and expose the monster beneath.
